00001 //Algebra helper functions for DCM
00002 
00003 static inline float Vector_Dot_Product(float vector1[3],float vector2[3])
00004 {
00005   return vector1[0]*vector2[0] + vector1[1]*vector2[1] + vector1[2]*vector2[2];
00006 }
00007 
00008 static inline void Vector_Cross_Product(float vectorOut[3], float v1[3],float v2[3])
00009 {
00010   vectorOut[0]= (v1[1]*v2[2]) - (v1[2]*v2[1]);
00011   vectorOut[1]= (v1[2]*v2[0]) - (v1[0]*v2[2]);
00012   vectorOut[2]= (v1[0]*v2[1]) - (v1[1]*v2[0]);
00013 }
00014 
00015 static inline void Vector_Scale(float vectorOut[3],float vectorIn[3], float scale2)
00016 {
00017   vectorOut[0]=vectorIn[0]*scale2;
00018   vectorOut[1]=vectorIn[1]*scale2;
00019   vectorOut[2]=vectorIn[2]*scale2;
00020 }
00021 
00022 static inline void Vector_Add(float vectorOut[3],float vectorIn1[3], float vectorIn2[3])
00023 {
00024   vectorOut[0]=vectorIn1[0]+vectorIn2[0];
00025   vectorOut[1]=vectorIn1[1]+vectorIn2[1];
00026   vectorOut[2]=vectorIn1[2]+vectorIn2[2];
00027 }

00043 static inline void Matrix_Multiply(float a[3][3], float b[3][3],float mat[3][3])
00044 {
00045   float op[3];
00046   for(int x=0; x<3; x++)
00047     {
00048       for(int y=0; y<3; y++)
00049         {
00050           for(int w=0; w<3; w++)
00051             {
00052               op[w]=a[x][w]*b[w][y];
00053             }
00054           mat[x][y]=op[0]+op[1]+op[2];
00055         }
00056     }
00057 }
